document_data.name: Beutaleen'dal
document_data.mainbody: The '''Beutaleen'dals''' were a noble [[moon elf]] family of the city of [[Loudwater]] in the [[Delimbiyr Vale]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite web/Legacy of the Green Regent/A Fellowship Rises}}
document_data.History:
On the third [[Night of the Blood Moon]] in the {{yearlinkName|1369}}, when [[Malarite]] [[lycanthrope]]s attacked Loudwater, [[Stedd Rein]] saved the life of Ovendal, the new matriarch of the Beutaleen'dal family.<ref>

Some time after [[Shieldmeet]] in the summer of the {{yearlinkName|1372}}, Beutaleen'dals tried to recruit [[adventurer]]s for an expedition into the [[Fallen Lands]]. They sought to recover a lost family heirloom.<ref><ref group="note">The Beutaleen'dals' expedition would likely have been detailed in the unreleased adventure ''[[Into the Fallen Lands]]''.
document_data.Notable Members:
* [[Ovendal Beutaleen'dal]], matriarch ''circa'' 1369 DR to [[1372 DR]]
* [[Rendonil Beutaleen'dal]]
* [[Bialis Beutaleen'dal]], nephew of Ovendal
